      • StatePathagon

        public StatePathagon(boolean maxX,
                     int tokensX,
                     int tokensY,
                     int turnX,
                     Token[][] boardX,
                     java.lang.String mov)
        Class builder
        Parameters:
        boolean - maxX If true is a max node but is a min node
        int - tokensX Number of tokens available to the user
        int - tokensY [description]
        int - turnX Turn to play, 1 for the user and 2 for the cpu
        Token[][] - boardX Game board
        String - mov Last rule applied
